full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I TSOGS MCHOD RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I TSOGS MCHOD RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI LHA CHEN PO 'DI NYID LA TSOGS 'KHOR 'BUL SHIN TU DGOS PA CHEN PO BYUNG BA'I TSE LA, CHO GA 'PHRAL DU MA RNYED LA 'DI 'DRA'I RTZOM PA BYED PA'I YON TAN GYI SNA TZAM MED KYANG DAM PA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEGS PAR LEN PA @010A *, ,LHA 'DI'I RJES GNANG SOGS ZHIB PAR THOB PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU YANG CHOS SKYONG RANG NYID KYANG THUGS DGYES PA'I RMI LTAS BYUNG BA LA RTEN NAS LHA 'DI PHYED PA'I DAD PA THOB PA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS TSIG SBYOR SDEBS LEGS MED PA'I 'CHAL GTAM TZAM DU BSGRIGS PA LA, LHAG CHAD NOR 'KHRUL YOD PA RNAMS MKHAS SHING GRUB PA RNAMS KYIS BCOS GNANG ZHING BZODPAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,)
